data.title: The Black Crowes ~ Songs List
data.text:
Rolling Stone: 3.5 stars out of 5 -- "On electric guitar, Rich has a forceful rhythmic attack -- a dirty treble cluck dotted with rubbery whines -- that drives the Crowes songs..."

Tracks of Disc 1

5.My Heart's Been Killing Me - (with Brothers Of a Feather)

14.Thorn in My Pride - (with Brothers Of a Feather)

Q: 4 stars out of 5 - "...Good old blues-based rock....SOUTHERN HARMONY's tracks such as 'Remedy' or 'Sting Me' undoubtedly represent highlights of this comp..."

Rolling Stone: 3.5 stars out of 5 -- "FREEZE is a set of American beauties that flow from spacey bluegrass to good-time boogie and pensive country folk."

Rolling Stone: 3.5 Stars - Good - "...echoes of the Stones and Led Zep resound - but in jolting the mix with offbeat kicks (Latino rhythms, wah-wah guitar, strange vocal treatments), they sound remarkably fresh..."

Tracks of Disc 1

1.Gone (Side A)

2.A Conspiracy (Side A)

3.Head High Blues (Side A)

4.Cursed Diamond (Side B)

5.Nonfiction (Side B)

6.She Gave Good Sunflower (Side B)
